Alternate Title: A day for Poilu. Organized by Parliament.
Creator: Poulbot, Francisque, 1879-1946, artist
Description: Poster showing a young girl in a Red Cross nurse's uniform and a small boy wearing a red cap, carrying a collection cup and selling medals - 'So that Papa may come on leave, if you please.'
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
